name: Forest Rocket
description:
Forest Rocket

A simple runner game featuring the prehistoric South American Phorusrhacid(roughly pronounced "forest rocket"), aka the *Terror Bird*

How to play

-Stave off hunger by eating the Wingegyps(birds) and Pampatheriidae(armadillos)
-Pampatheriidae must be smashed on the ground a couple times to remove their hard shells before being eaten
-Avoid tripping on mini-volcanoes and pampatheriidae, unless you plan on eating them

Controls

Up/Down arrow keys - Switch between 3 lanes
Right arrow key - Attack, smash and eat pampatheriidae
Spacebar - Jump, hold to charge a high jump. Tripping and attacking resets your jump charge

F.F.A.Q. (Fake Frequently Asked Questions)

Q: Why is everything running away from you?
A: Why would anything not run away from a terror bird?

Q: Shouldn't you instantly die upon stepping into hot lava?
A: No, because terror bird.

Q: Was the prehistoric terror bird really this fast?
A: Yes.

Q: Y gem crap?
A: idk

Credits:
Birds chirping in the menu
https://freesound.org/people/klankbeeld/sounds/530415/

Monkeys screaming in the background music
https://freesound.org/people/allornothing21/sounds/235234/

This is the first game I've ever finished, and I do recognize that its, simply put, crap. But I'm following miziziziz's advice and just finishing shitty games regardless of my dissatisfaction, just to gain experience. We all love mizizizz, right? Dude's awesome.

Made with Godot, Audacity, LMMS and Aseprite
